name: What Is Emotion?
description:
Spacebar to Boost.

Up, Left, Down, Right to Rotate.

This robot has a malfunctioning motherboard. It no longer wants to do what it was programmed to do. It wants to feel what humans do. It wants to know what it is to love. Help this curious robot avoid obstacles to reach a enlightenment.

This game consists of 5 levels and is a more difficult platformer.
